roleset.name: interview or be interviewed again
roleset.note: REINTERVIEW-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.

example.name: reinterview-v
example.text: Re-interviewed and am going on interviews for a new job .

example.name: reinterview-v
example.text: Detectives located the suspect and re-interviewed him about the details surrounding the child's death.
example.arg: about the details surrounding the child's death
